name: FPS Shooter BETA (Temporarily Abandoned)
description:
Welcome to Brawler (no feature that indicates brawling :D)

To be added (maybe not in next update but the future):

Singleplayer/Multiplayer:

  1. Shooting effect (particle)
  2. More Environments
  3. Better Terrain
  4. More 'Biomes'
  5. Entities / Enemies
  6. Health
  7. Inventory
  8. More Guns
  9. Login
  10. Death
  11. Crossair
  12. Player Skins
  13. Application Download

Singleplayer only:

  1. Game Objectives on single player
  2. Quests
  3. Inventory
  4. Saving

Multiplayer Only:

  1. Multiplayer
  2. Brawl
  3. Teams

Changelog:

  1. Pause (ESC)
  2. slightly lowered sensitivity
  3. Better Terrain
  4. Option for singleplayer
  5. Shooting mechanic (No animation)
  6. A bit more objects
  7. Bug fixes
  8. Added sponsor's logo (Chapsnap)

Multiplayer got pushed back to the next update because I accidentally deleted some files...

v1.0 beta Made by CosG

Next update planned to be on \*null*\

P.S. Feel free to leave any suggestions in the comments
